name: Cognition
description: Applied AI lab developing advanced AI software engineering solutions, creator of Devin, the first AI software engineer that can autonomously write, debug, and deploy code.

zh-Hans.description: 专注于 AI 软件工程的应用型 AI 实验室,创造了 Devin - 首个能够自主编写、调试和部署代码的 AI 软件工程师。

de.description: Angewandtes KI-Labor zur Entwicklung fortschrittlicher KI-Softwareentwicklungslösungen, Schöpfer von Devin, dem ersten KI-Softwareingenieur.
